title: Name Mismatch
description: The name on the submitted document does not match the record in the database.
possible_causes: Typographical errors in the document or database.
Different formatting or order of names.
Use of nicknames or abbreviated names.
recommended_actions: Verify the spelling of the name in the document and database.
Ask the candidate to provide a government-issued ID for clarification.
Update database records if an official name change has occurred.
escalation_note: Please flag to HR immediately if identity verification fails.
faq: Why does my name not match the database?
How can I correct my name in the records?
What documents are accepted for name verification?

title: Date of Birth Mismatch
description: The date of birth on the submitted document does not match the record in the database.
recommended_actions: Request the candidate to confirm the date of birth with supporting documents.
escalation_note: Notify HR if repeated mismatches occur.
faq: Why is my date of birth mismatched?
How can I update my date of birth in the system?
Which documents are valid for date of birth verification?

title: License Number Mismatch
description: The license number on the submitted document does not match the record in the database.
possible_causes: Incorrect license number entered in database.
Expired or invalid license number provided.
Candidate may have renewed or updated their license.
recommended_actions: Confirm license number with candidate and relevant licensing authority.
Update database records if license is renewed.
escalation_note: Escalate to HR and compliance team immediately.
faq: What should I do if my license number does not match?
How can I verify the correct license number?
Who do I contact for license renewal?

title: License Validity Date Mismatch
description: The validity date on the submitted document does not match the database record.
possible_causes: Document is expired or near expiry.
Candidate may have renewed license but database not updated.
recommended_actions: Ask the candidate to provide the latest valid license.
Update database with current validity dates.
escalation_note: Immediate attention needed to avoid compliance risks.
faq: Why does my license validity date not match the database?
What happens if my license is expired?
How can I update my license validity in the system?

title: Required Field Missing
description: One or more required fields are missing or unclear in the submitted document.
possible_causes: Poor scan quality or document damage.
recommended_actions: Request clearer scans or re-submission of documents.
Provide guidance on required document format and fields.
escalation_note: Follow up with candidate before escalating.
